backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor that defines types and storage maps for Documents, Resumes, and Image Metadata, using a blob storage mixin for file handling on the Internet Computer.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs to their associated source files, component dependencies, and test IDs for tracking build requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON catalog of short summaries for all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key characteristics of each page, component, and utility in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes including colors, borders, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML shell for the React app with viewport meta, font preconnect hints, and a single root div that loads the main TSX entry point.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers and pointing to the sitemap at docmastertools.com.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing all public URLs for docmastertools.com with last-modified dates, change frequencies, and priority values for SEO.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that lazy-loads all pages and implements state-based client-side routing, mapping path-style keys to page components with navigation props.
frontend/src/components/AdPlaceholder.ts: Reusable ad placeholder component that renders a sized, labeled box for banner, in-content, or sidebar ad slots using aspect-ratio styling.
frontend/src/components/AdvancedToolShel: A reusable shell component for file-processing tools that manages a multi-step workflow (upload → settings → preview/download) with drag-and-drop support, file metadata display, and single or multiple file handling.
frontend/src/components/BackToHomeButton: A simple button component that navigates the user back to the home page, using either a provided onNavigate callback or direct window.location assignment.
frontend/src/components/BatchFileQueue.t: Displays a queue of batch-processed files with per-file status icons (pending, processing, done, error), individual download buttons, and bulk download/clear actions.
frontend/src/components/BreadcrumbNaviga: Renders an accessible breadcrumb nav with Schema.org BreadcrumbList JSON-LD injection, supporting click handlers, path-based navigation, and a Home icon for the first item.
frontend/src/components/calculators/AgeC: A calculator component that takes a birth date input and computes the user's age in years/months/days along with totals in months, weeks, days, and hours, plus days until the next birthday.
frontend/src/components/calculators/BMIC: A BMI calculator supporting kg/lbs weight and cm/feet-inches height inputs, displaying the computed BMI value, weight category, and healthy weight range.
frontend/src/components/calculators/CGPA: A multi-semester CGPA calculator where users can add/remove semesters and courses with grade points and credits, computing the cumulative GPA across all entries.
Converts a CGPA value to percentage using either the CBSE formula (×9.5) or an Engineering formula (×10), selectable via radio buttons.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Comp: A React component that calculates compound interest given principal, annual rate, time period, and compounding frequency, displaying the interest earned and final amount.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Date: A React component that calculates the difference between two dates in years, months, days, weeks, and total days, with an option to exclude weekends.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Disc: A React component that calculates discounted prices either from a discount percentage or a sale price, showing the discount amount and final price.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Divi: A React component that determines academic division (First, Second, Third, or Fail) based on an entered percentage score, with a reference criteria table.
frontend/src/components/calculators/EMIC: A React component that computes monthly EMI, total interest, and total repayment amount for a loan given principal, annual interest rate, and tenure in months or years.
frontend/src/components/calculators/GPAC: A React component that calculates weighted GPA on a 4.0 or 10.0 scale from multiple courses, each with a grade and credit value, with support for adding or removing courses.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Grad: A React component that calculates weighted GPA from multiple courses using a 10-point letter grade scale, allowing dynamic addition and removal of course entries.
frontend/src/components/calculators/GSTC: A React component that calculates GST by either adding it to a base amount or removing it from a total, supporting preset rates (5%, 12%, 18%, 28%) and a custom rate input.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Loan: A React component that computes loan repayment tenure in months/years given a loan amount, annual interest rate, and fixed monthly payment, also showing total interest and total repayment.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Mark: A React component that calculates the percentage from obtained and total marks, and displays a pass/fail result based on a 40% threshold.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Perc: A React component that converts a percentage to CGPA using either the CBSE formula (÷9.5) or an Engineering formula (÷10), selectable via radio buttons.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Prof: A React component that calculates profit or loss amount and percentage from cost price and selling price, with color-coded results for profit (green) and loss (red).
frontend/src/components/calculators/Sala: A React component that calculates salary hike either from a given percentage or from a desired salary amount, showing new salary, monthly/annual increments, and required hike percentage.
frontend/src/components/calculators/SGPA: A React component that calculates SGPA by allowing users to add/remove courses with grade points and credits, displaying the weighted average on a 10.0 scale.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Simp: A React component that computes simple interest and total amount using the SI = (P × R × T) / 100 formula, with inputs for principal, rate, and time period.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Time: A React component that supports three time calculation modes: computing duration between two times, and adding or subtracting hours/minutes/seconds from a base time.
frontend/src/components/CrossCategorySug: Shows a grid of cross-category tool suggestions (calculators, PDF tools, image tools) based on the current tool category, with navigation callbacks for each suggestion card.
Renders a download UI for one or multiple processed files, displaying file names and sizes with download buttons, and optional actions to process another file or clear results.
frontend/src/components/FAQSchema.tsx: Injects a Schema.org FAQPage JSON-LD script tag into the page based on a provided array of question-and-answer pairs.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadZone.t: A drag-and-drop file upload zone component that validates file size, triggers a file-select callback, and renders a styled dropzone with a hidden file input.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand description, quick navigation links to internal pages and external sites, and a legal section, using an `onNavigate` callback for internal routing.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky top navigation header with a logo, desktop nav links, a mobile hamburger menu, and a language selector, supporting both internal page navigation and external URL links.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section component displaying a headline, tagline, CTA buttons, key stats (private/tools/free), and a banner image for the Document Master Tools landing page.
frontend/src/components/image-tools/Auto: A React panel component offering automated image processing features including white background application via flood-fill, JPEG compression to a target KB size, and a 2×2 multi-copy A4 layout generator.

A React component that resizes and compresses uploaded images to match predefined photo presets (passport, Aadhaar, visa, etc.) or custom dimensions, with JPEG quality reduction to meet file size limits.
frontend/src/components/image-tools/Back: A React component that lets users upload an image, pick a background color (from presets or a color picker), and simulate replacing the background, then download the result.
A React component that accepts an image upload and simulates AI-powered background removal, producing a PNG download with the background stripped.
frontend/src/components/image-tools/Befo: A React component that displays original and processed images side-by-side (or individually) with zoom, rotation, crop-guide overlay, and optional watermark controls.
frontend/src/components/image-tools/Expo: A React component that exports a processed image canvas to multiple formats (JPEG, PNG, WebP, PDF, multi-copy A4 layout), with pro-gated options and pure-JS PDF generation.
frontend/src/components/image-tools/Imag: A React component that allows users to upload an image, adjust a quality slider, and simulate compression to reduce file size, then download the compressed result.
frontend/src/components/image-tools/Phot: A React component that lets users upload an image and resize it to a specific file size (preset KB values or custom), then download the resized output.
A React component for resizing photos with support for presets, multiple units (px/cm/mm/inches), aspect ratio locking, quality control, and optional target file size output.
frontend/src/components/image-tools/ProP: A modal component displaying Pro plan pricing (monthly ₹399 / yearly ₹3000) with a feature comparison table and activation buttons.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown UI component that lets users select a language from a supported list, persisting the choice via a `LanguageContext` and closing on outside clicks.
frontend/src/components/pdf-tools/BasePD: A reusable base component for PDF tools that handles file upload, simulated processing, and download flow via configurable props.
frontend/src/components/pdf-tools/ImageT: A PDF tool component that accepts multiple image uploads and simulates converting them into a downloadable PDF file.
frontend/src/components/pdf-tools/PDFAdd: A thin wrapper around BasePDFTool configured to add page numbers to a PDF document.
A thin wrapper around BasePDFTool configured to apply a watermark to a PDF document.
frontend/src/components/pdf-tools/PDFCom: A PDF compression tool component offering both automatic and manual (quality slider) compression modes with simulated size reduction and download.
frontend/src/components/pdf-tools/PDFMer: A React component that allows users to upload multiple PDF files and merge them into a single document, with file list management, simulated processing, and download functionality.
frontend/src/components/pdf-tools/PDFOCR: A thin wrapper around BasePDFTool configured to perform OCR on scanned PDFs and output a searchable PDF document.
frontend/src/components/pdf-tools/PDFPag: A thin wrapper around BasePDFTool configured to count pages in a PDF and output a plain-text report.
frontend/src/components/pdf-tools/PDFPas: A thin wrapper around BasePDFTool configured to add password protection to a PDF document.
A thin wrapper around BasePDFTool configured to remove password protection from a PDF document.
frontend/src/components/pdf-tools/PDFRem: A thin wrapper around BasePDFTool configured to detect and remove blank pages from a PDF document.
frontend/src/components/pdf-tools/PDFReo: A thin wrapper around BasePDFTool configured to reorder pages within a PDF document.
frontend/src/components/pdf-tools/PDFSig: A thin wrapper around BasePDFTool configured to add a digital signature to a PDF document.
frontend/src/components/pdf-tools/PDFSpl: A React component that allows users to upload a PDF and split it into multiple files by specifying page ranges, with simulated processing and per-file download support.
frontend/src/components/pdf-tools/PDFToI: A React component that converts an uploaded PDF to images (PNG/JPG), simulates processing, and offers a ZIP download of the resulting images.
frontend/src/components/pdf-tools/PDFToW: A thin wrapper around BasePDFTool configured to convert a PDF to an editable Word (.docx) document.
frontend/src/components/pdf-tools/WordTo: A thin wrapper around BasePDFTool configured to convert Word (.doc/.docx) documents to PDF format.
frontend/src/components/PostDownloadNavi: Renders two navigation buttons after a download action—one to go back home and one to navigate to a configurable tool hub—using either a provided `onNavigate` callback or direct URL navigation.
Displays a loading/processing UI with an animated icon, spinner, status message, and an optional progress bar with percentage.
frontend/src/components/RelatedTools.tsx: Renders a grid of related tool cards, each with an icon, name, description, and a 'Try Tool' button, intended for cross-promotion between tools.
frontend/src/components/resume/ColorThem: A React component that renders a grid of selectable color theme swatches for resume styling, highlighting the currently selected theme.
frontend/src/components/resume/forms/Ach: Form component for adding, editing, and removing achievement entries (title and description) within resume data.
frontend/src/components/resume/forms/Cer: Form component for managing certification entries (name, issuer, date) in the resume, supporting add and remove operations.
frontend/src/components/resume/forms/Edu: Form component for adding, editing, and removing education entries (institution, degree, field, dates, grade) in the resume.
frontend/src/components/resume/forms/Exp: Form component for managing work experience entries (company, position, dates, current job checkbox, description) in the resume.
frontend/src/components/resume/forms/Lan: Form component for adding and removing language entries with a name input and proficiency level selector (Native to Basic).
frontend/src/components/resume/forms/Per: Form component for editing personal information in a resume, including fields for name, phone, email, summary, and photo upload, with support for Indian-specific formatting and AI-generated professional summaries.
frontend/src/components/resume/forms/Pro: Form component for managing resume projects, allowing users to add, remove, and edit project entries with fields for title, description, technologies, and link.
frontend/src/components/resume/forms/Ref: Form component for managing resume references, allowing users to add, remove, and edit reference entries with fields for name, position, company, phone, and email.
frontend/src/components/resume/forms/Ski: Form component for managing resume skills, allowing users to add, remove, and edit skill entries with name and proficiency level fields.
frontend/src/components/resume/ResumeEdi: An empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/resume/ResumeFor: A multi-step wizard form for building a resume, supporting step navigation, progress tracking, color theme selection, and both desktop and mobile (accordion) layouts across sections like personal info, education, and experience.
frontend/src/components/resume/ResumePre: Renders a live resume preview with color theming applied, displaying personal info, education, experience, and other sections, along with a Download PDF button that shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/resume/ResumeTem: Empty file with no content; likely a placeholder for a resume template selection component.
frontend/src/components/SEO.tsx: Headless component that dynamically sets document title, meta description, Open Graph, Twitter Card tags, and canonical link via `useEffect` based on provided props.
frontend/src/components/SoftwareApplicat: Injects a JSON-LD `SoftwareApplication` schema script tag into the page for structured data, including pricing, feature list, aggregate rating, and sample reviews.
frontend/src/components/ToolCategories.t: Renders a 'Explore More Tools' section with three category cards (Calculators, PDF Tools, Image Tools), highlighting the active category and providing navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/ToolsGrid.tsx: Displays a grid of tool category cards (PDF Tools, Image Tools, Resume Builder) with icons, descriptions, and click-to-navigate functionality.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: React context provider that manages multi-language support for 19 languages, handling translation loading with caching, RTL/LTR direction, browser language detection, and persisted language preference.
Static configuration data for resume templates, defining metadata such as name, category, description, SEO fields, target audience, key features, and FAQs for each template type.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an Internet Computer actor instance using the current identity, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBatchProcessor.ts: Custom React hook that manages batch file processing state, including adding, processing, downloading, and removing files, with support for sequential downloads when multiple files are done.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and context provider for Internet Identity (ICP) authentication, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useProAccess.ts: Custom React hook that manages pro/free subscription status using localStorage, exposing activate, deactivate, and dev-toggle functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook that returns an empty object, noting that all processing is client-side and no backend queries are needed for Phase 1.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for the dark color theme, and adds utility classes including RTL support.
frontend/src/lib/colorThemes.ts: Defines an array of predefined color themes for resumes and provides helper functions to apply a theme as CSS variables and validate color contrast.
frontend/src/lib/imageProcessing.ts: Provides browser-based image processing utilities including loading, resizing, compressing to a target file size, and converting image formats using Canvas API.
frontend/src/lib/pageSizePresets.ts: Defines standard page size presets (A4, Legal, Letter) with mm dimensions and provides utility functions to convert mm to pixels at a given DPI.
frontend/src/lib/resumeFormatters.ts: Utility functions for formatting resume data including skills as bullet lists, dates, phone numbers, proper nouns, and experience durations.
frontend/src/lib/summaryGenerator.ts: Generates a professional resume summary string by calculating years of experience, extracting top skills, and combining them with random action verbs from the resume data.
frontend/src/locales/ar.json: Arabic translation strings for the application UI, covering navigation labels, tool names, file operations, and status messages.
frontend/src/locales/bn.json: Bengali (bn) locale file containing full translations for navigation, home page sections, footer, and common UI actions for DocMasterTools.com.
frontend/src/locales/de.json: German (de) locale file with flat-structure translations for common UI labels such as navigation items, file operations, tool names, and processing states.
frontend/src/locales/en.json: English (en) locale file serving as the base translation with nested keys covering navigation, home page content, footer, and common UI actions.
frontend/src/locales/es.json: Spanish (es) locale file with flat-structure translations for navigation, file operations, tool names, and processing states.
frontend/src/locales/fr.json: French (fr) locale file with flat-structure translations for navigation, file operations, tool names, and processing states.
frontend/src/locales/gu.json: Gujarati (gu) locale file containing full nested translations for navigation, home page sections, footer, and common UI actions for DocMasterTools.com.
frontend/src/locales/hi.json: Hindi (hi) locale file containing full nested translations for navigation, home page sections, footer, and common UI actions for DocMasterTools.com.
frontend/src/locales/id.json: Indonesian (id) locale file with flat-structure translations for navigation, file operations, tool names, and processing states.
frontend/src/locales/ja.json: Japanese (ja) locale file with flat-structure translations for navigation, file operations, tool names, and processing states.
frontend/src/locales/kn.json: Kannada (kn) locale file providing UI string translations for navigation, home page sections, footer, and common actions for the DocMasterTools frontend.
frontend/src/locales/ml.json: Malayalam (ml) locale file providing UI string translations for navigation, home page sections, footer, and common actions for the DocMasterTools frontend.
frontend/src/locales/mr.json: Marathi (mr) locale file providing UI string translations for navigation, home page sections, footer, and common actions for the DocMasterTools frontend.
frontend/src/locales/pt.json: Portuguese (pt) locale file with a flat key-value structure covering navigation labels, file operation actions, tool categories, and processing status strings.
frontend/src/locales/ru.json: Russian (ru) locale file with a flat key-value structure covering navigation labels, file operation actions, tool categories, and processing status strings.
frontend/src/locales/ta.json: Tamil (ta) locale file providing UI string translations for navigation, home page sections, footer, and common actions for the DocMasterTools frontend.
frontend/src/locales/te.json: Telugu (te) locale file providing UI string translations for navigation, home page sections, footer, and common actions for the DocMasterTools frontend.
frontend/src/locales/ur.json: Urdu (ur) locale file providing translations for navigation, home page, footer, and common UI strings for the DocMasterTools application.
frontend/src/locales/zh.json: Simplified Chinese (zh) locale file providing translations for navigation, tool actions, file handling, and UI state labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/AgeCalcul: Age calculator page with SEO metadata, structured data schema, breadcrumb navigation, the AgeCalculator component, related tools suggestions, and descriptive content about the tool.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/BMICalcul: BMI calculator page that sets the document title on mount, renders the BMICalculator component, and includes a brief description of BMI categories and the calculation formula.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/CGPACalcu: CGPA calculator page that sets the document title and meta description on mount, renders the CGPACalculator component, and explains the weighted average formula used for calculation.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/CGPAToPer: Page component for the CGPA to Percentage Converter tool, setting the document title and rendering the converter component with a back button and descriptive content.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/CompoundI: Page component for the Compound Interest Calculator, displaying the calculator with explanatory text about the compound interest formula and compounding frequencies.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/DateDiffe: Page component for the Date Difference Calculator, rendering the calculator with a description of its use cases including business day calculations and project planning.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/DiscountC: Page component for the Discount Calculator, wrapping the calculator component with a description of its two modes: calculating final price from discount percentage or finding discount percentage from sale price.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/DivisionC: Page component for the academic Division Calculator, displaying the calculator with an explanation of First, Second, and Third Division percentage thresholds used in Indian educational institutions.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/EMICalcul: Page component for the EMI Calculator, rendering the calculator with the EMI formula and a description of its use for home, car, and personal loan calculations.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/GPACalcul: Page component for the GPA Calculator supporting both 4.0 and 10.0 scales, with a description of weighted GPA calculation using course grades and credit hours.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/GradeCalc: Page component for the Grade Calculator, rendering the calculator with an explanation of letter-grade-to-grade-point conversion and weighted GPA calculation.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/GSTCalcul: Page component for the GST Calculator, wrapping the calculator with descriptions of add/remove GST modes and supported tax rates (5%, 12%, 18%, 28%, and custom).
frontend/src/pages/calculators/LoanCalcu: Page component for the Loan Calculator, displaying the calculator with a description of how it determines repayment tenure and total interest based on monthly payment capacity.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/MarksPerc: Page component for the Marks Percentage Calculator, rendering the calculator with the percentage formula and a note about pass/fail indication at the 40% threshold.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/Percentag: Page component for the Percentage to CGPA Converter, wrapping the converter with descriptions of CBSE and Engineering reverse formulas for converting percentage to CGPA.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/ProfitLos: Page component for the Profit/Loss Percentage Calculator that sets the document title and renders the ProfitLossCalculator component with a back button and explanatory text.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/SalaryHik: Page component for the Salary Hike Calculator that sets the document title and renders the SalaryHikeCalculator component with a back button and usage description.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/SGPACalcu: Page component for the SGPA Calculator that sets the document title and renders the SGPACalculator component with a back button and description of the weighted average formula.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/SimpleInt: Page component for the Simple Interest Calculator that sets the document title and renders the SimpleInterestCalculator component with a back button and formula explanation.
frontend/src/pages/calculators/TimeDurat: Page component for the Time Duration Calculator that sets the document title and renders the TimeDurationCalculator component with a back button and feature description.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorsPage.tsx: Page component listing all available calculators grouped into Academic, Financial, and Health/General categories, each navigable via card clicks.
frontend/src/pages/DisclaimerPage.tsx: Static disclaimer page outlining limitations of tool accuracy, user responsibilities, external links policy, and liability disclaimers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component displaying hero section, featured PDF tools, image tools, and calculator category cards with navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/AadhaarPh: Page for resizing photos to Aadhaar card specifications (200×200 or 480×640 pixels) using the shared PhotoResizeTool component with predefined presets.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/AIDocumen: Pro-gated page for an AI Document Enhancer tool that shows feature cards (AI enhancement, text clarity, noise removal) to authenticated Pro users and a pricing/login prompt to others.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/Backgroun: Page that provides client-side background removal by making near-white pixels transparent, with options for background fill (transparent, white, custom color, blur), output format, and quality.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/CustomIma: Feature-rich image resize page offering multiple resize modes (easy presets, percentage, dimensions, file size, print, social media) with unit conversion, aspect ratio lock, and social media platform presets.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/DPIChange: A React page that allows users to change the DPI metadata of an image using preset or custom DPI values, outputting as JPEG or PNG via canvas processing.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/ImageComp: A React page for compressing images with configurable quality, output format (JPEG/PNG/WebP), and optional target file size, using canvas-based processing.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/ImageCrop: A React page for cropping images with configurable aspect ratios, crop region (in pixels or percentage), output format, and quality using canvas rendering.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/JPGToPNGP: A React page that converts JPG images to PNG or WebP format with optional quality and target file size settings via canvas-based processing.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/PANPhotoR: A React page that resizes photos to PAN card specifications (NSDL/UTIITSL) using predefined presets via the reusable PhotoResizeTool component.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/PassportP: React page for a passport photo maker tool that provides presets for India, US, UK, Schengen, and Canada passport photo dimensions, rendered via the PhotoResizeTool component.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/PNGToJPGP: A React page that converts PNG images to JPEG or WebP format with configurable quality and optional target file size, using canvas-based processing.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/PoliceArm: React page for resizing photos to Police, Army, and CAPF recruitment specifications using predefined presets via the PhotoResizeTool component.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/RailwayPh: React page for resizing photos to Indian Railway exam specifications (RRB NTPC, Group D, ALP) using the PhotoResizeTool component.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/Signature: React page for resizing signature images to Aadhaar, PAN, and exam application specifications using the PhotoResizeTool component.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/SmartDocu: React page for an AI-powered document photo fixer with a free-tier usage limit (2 fixes/day), pro access gating, before/after preview, and export options.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/SSCPhotoR: React page for resizing photos to SSC exam specifications (CGL, CHSL, MTS, GD) using predefined presets via the PhotoResizeTool component.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/VisaPhoto: React page for resizing photos to visa specifications for US, UK, Schengen, Canada, and Australia using the PhotoResizeTool component.
frontend/src/pages/image-tools/WEBPConve: React page for converting images to WebP, JPEG, or PNG formats with configurable quality and optional target file size, processed client-side via Canvas API.
frontend/src/pages/ImageToolsPage.tsx: Image tools hub page organizing tools into Government, Processing, and Conversion categories with badge indicators for popular/pro/new tools.
frontend/src/pages/PDFToolsPage.tsx: Main PDF tools hub page that displays a grid of 16 PDF tool cards and renders the selected tool component based on user selection. Manages tool selection state and provides navigation back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Static privacy policy page explaining that all file processing is browser-based with no server uploads, detailing what data is and isn't collected, and outlining user rights.
frontend/src/pages/resume-builder/Resume: A React page component for building a resume using a specific template slug, featuring a form wizard and live preview with auto-save to localStorage and SEO/breadcrumb support.
frontend/src/pages/ResumeBuilderPage.tsx: Resume builder hub page listing 7 Indian and 7 international resume templates as clickable cards, with SEO metadata, breadcrumb navigation, and ad placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfUsePage.tsx: Static terms of use page covering license grants, user responsibilities, disclaimers, limitations of liability, and governing law for Document Master Tools.
frontend/src/types/resume.ts: TypeScript type definitions for the resume builder, including interfaces for all resume sections (PersonalInfo, Education, Experience, etc.) and supported template types.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, extended border radius, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file (version 33) summarizing all completed phases of the all-in-one utility platform, architectural notes, known issues, and a registry of existing features.
